content: this is the free tunisian crochet pattern and homework for lesson one of bicrafty bootcamp triple threat tunisian for beginners 1 learn how to choose the right tunisian hook learn how to do foundation stitches for tunisian learn tunisian simple stitch follow along on this 4 week course to learn the basics of tunisian crochet then continue to the expert level course in the marly bird house 2 coming spring 2023 1 https //marlybird com/bicrafty-bootcamp-tunisian-crochet-beginners/ 2 http //marlybirdhouse com
